programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 5
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

Sidong opened the locker and found a key and a card with a logo. 思冬根据方行的线索，回到风水店，发现方行自愿死亡的协议书。彭喜愉约思冬回新加坡，向思冬讲及对方行的感情，以及因为得知方行多情而之前隐瞒的事。原来方行意外前，曾到新加坡将一些东西暂放在喜愉公司的储物柜，喜愉直觉思冬需要它。思冬打开 储物柜，只见一条锁匙和一张有标志的卡片。.

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 6
programme.desc: Italy's Sant' Angelo del Lombardi Prison is a model prison. 80% of their prisoners are getting a paid job here. Those who keep good conduct are allowed to work outside. Each year the prison receives 30-40 transfer requests. There are criminals turning themselves in asking to serve their term here. 意大利圣安杰洛监狱是一所模范监狱，透过改造计划，百分之八十的囚犯获得受薪工作，表现特优者还能外出工作，作息不受监督。这所监狱每年接获30至40个调迁申请，还有罪犯自己找上门，要求在这里服刑。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 29
programme.desc: Ep 29: Daoxi tries to look for Na-yan when she hears about her disappearance. She asks Yinfeng to send Na-yan's personal information and photographs to her. Instead of being intimidated, Duying and Xiuchang say Jiezi Cosmetics will withdraw from YB's retail shops if Shenghe pulls any tricks. 胜赫说若度英坚持要跟世娜离婚，YB就会收回工厂，让洁姿美妆无法顺利生产面膜。度英和秀昌不受威胁，并说如果YB收回工厂，他们就会撤出YB的卖场，倒是YB的损失将很惨重。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 3
programme.desc: This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Moscow. 这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览莫斯科。.

programme.title: 检法男女 Partners For Justice - EP 14
programme.desc: Ep19: While grilling some pork skin at a restaurant with Baifan,Yinshuai suddenly has an epiphany and asks for surveillance footages of Yan Shangjiu's area on the day of his death and found an important lead that reveals the cause of Shangjiu's death.Ep 20:The body of a young lady, Cheng Huibin is found in the mountain by a hiker. Baifan notices that her limbs are tied and her fingerprints are missing. Baifan also meets up with Deputy Chief Prosecutor Du Zhian, whom he is not on good terms. Ep 19: 与白范一起烤猪皮时，殷率突然顿悟，要求查看炎尚九当日死亡前附近的监控录像,不料发现炎尚九的死因。Ep 20:成慧彬的尸体被登山者在登山时发现，白范留意到手被绳结和她的指纹消失，他和检察官都智安碰面，但两人都不友善。.

programme.title: KiniTV
programme.desc: Laporan berita dalam dan luar negara berbahasa Inggeris terbitan KiniTV Sdn Bhd.

programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Dimensi Cergas episod ini menerangkan tentang latihan kecergasan rintangan tinggi atau high-intensity interval training (HIIT).

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Episod pertama memberi tumpuan kepada bagaimana program mengenal pasti bakat melalui proses pemilihan, penilaian, pencarian dan penyelidikan tentang bakat sukan seseorang individu dilaksanakan dengan bantuan sains sukan.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Rencah Hidup membawakan kisah keinsafan dari insan-insan yang pernah melakukan kesalahan. Episod ini memaparkan kisah insan yang terlibat dengan Lumba Haram.

programme.title: Hijau Dot Com
programme.desc: Hijau Dot Com episod kali ini membawakan isu sampah dan mentaliti ubah sikap dan pengurusannya.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Al-Mulki Nusantara episod ini melihat hubungan antara Kerajaan China dan Kerajaan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Doktor Pokok adalah sebuah rancangan yang bertemakan Kenali Penyakit Pelihara Tanaman yang dihoskan oleh Heliza Helmi. Episod kali ini membawakan anda dengan lebih dekat mengenai kulat tanaman terutamanya pada nenas.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Bersama hos Iswan Ismail kenali makanan cina muslim di Malaysia.

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini memaparkan mengenai Sindrom Kurang Daya Tumpuan dan Hiperaktif (ADHD).

programme.title: Langit Borneo
programme.desc: Program travelog Langit Borneo memaparkan keindahan bumi Borneo dari pelbagai segi seperti pantai, bangunan dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Legenda Seni
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan kehidupan tokoh seni tanah air yang dihoskan oleh Sabhi Saddi.

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Ladang (Siri 2)
programme.desc: Bersama Alif Hadi ke ladang perusahaan kayu manis milik En Asnin dan perkongsian resepi Sup Buntui.

programme.title: 3P
programme.desc: Jom! Menyelami dan kenali perkerjaan yang luar biasa Bersama Baki Zainal.

programme.title: Kembara Damai
programme.desc: Program travelog ke destinasi pelancongan yang menampilkan gaya hidup dan rutin gaya hidup masyarakat muslim negara Asean.

programme.title: Berita Pagi
programme.desc: Membawa berita-berita menyeluruh dan terkini di seluruh Malaysia khas untuk anda.

programme.title: Berita Pagi Sabah
programme.desc: Saksikan berita pagi dari Sabah yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini serta isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Berita Pagi Sarawak
programme.desc: Saksikan Berita Pagi Sarawak memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Selamat Pagi Malaysia
programme.desc: Rancangan yang memaparkan segmen perbincangan bersama panel jemputan seperti Topik Semasa, Info Semasa, Doktor dan Anda, Pendidikan, Filem Kita dan Wanita.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin

programme.title: Nota Dari Hati
programme.desc: Memaparkan dokumentasi visual perjalanan Orkestra RTM sepanjang 59 tahun kewujudannya. Muzik yang mereka mainkan bertaraf dunia dan jenama yang terbina ini telah dikenali serata dunia. Menampilkan tokoh - tokoh penting dan mereka yang berada di sebalik tabir. Penonton akan dapat mengikuti rutin persiapan yang perlu dijalani ketika penerbitan sesuatu konsert orkestra berlangsung. Penonton turut dihiburkan dengan klip - klip video istimewa persembahan Orkestra RTM.

programme.title: Bomba Beach
programme.desc: Two young hip-hop strutters travel to Puerto Rico to explore the bomba dance style and the culture around it. Hosts Niki Awandee and Niek Traa connect with Puerto Rican locals to become their students, learn about the bomba dance style and its culture, and integrate them into their own style. Will they be able to live up to their teachers’ expectations?

programme.title: Kilimanjaro: Mountain of Greatness
programme.desc: Facing intense altitude challenges and health risks this team set out to conquer Tanzania's Mount Kilimanjaro. Hans Rey, Danny MacAskill and Gerhard Czerner head out on the mountain bike journey of a lifetime. Facing intense altitude challenges and health risks, this team attempt to conquer Mount Kilimanjaro on two wheels.

programme.title: A new season begins
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with motocross's top riders at the start of the 2019 season. As the 2019 MX campaign begins, there are contrasting fortunes for Jeffrey Herlings, Tom Vialle, Jorge Prado and Toni Cairoli. Find out how the season starts for each rider.

programme.title: Disc Golf and Slam Dunks
programme.desc: The snowboarding mates spend a day meeting the wildlife, playing disc golf, and racing vintage snowmobiles. When the weather doesn't cooperate for snowboarding, it's time to find other distractions. Jake and Roland spend a down day hanging out with some wolves, playing disc golf, riding old snowmobiles, and having a good-old fashioned Alaskan bonfire.

programme.title: Final Powder Sessions
programme.desc: It's last call for snowfall as Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska riding as much as they can. Snowboarders Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska doing what they came to do: ride epic terrain. The last lines of the trip confirm what they always suspected – that this was going to be a life-changing experience for them and their crew.

programme.title: Epecuén
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill explores the lost Argentinian town that has been submerged for most of the past 25 years. Tragedy struck the town of Epecuén 25 years ago when rains flooded the streets. Now, Danny MacAskill hops on his trials bike to explore the lost Argentinian town, which has been submerged for the majority of time since.

programme.title: Follow the Fraser
programme.sub-title: A mountain bike excursion into the unknown
programme.desc: Three professional mountain bikers travel north through Canada, riding their way toward the unknown. Three star mountain bikers follow the Fraser River north through Canada, building and riding features along the way. Their trek takes them past their hometowns towards unridden territory and an unknown destination that holds a secret.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.sub-title: The Past, Present and Future of Snowboarding
programme.desc: Women's snowboarding is in the spotlight in a tribute to the athletes who've made the sport what it is today. This two-year film project features the world’s best female snowboarders. It pays tribute to the history of women's snowboarding and showcases how it has influenced and encouraged the current state of the sport.

programme.title: Drop Everything
programme.desc: Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to slope-side action, featuring world-class skiers. With tongues firmly in cheeks, Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to the passion behind slope-side action. Sit back and enjoy stunning scenery, awesome tricks from world-class skiers and belly-laughing comedy.

programme.title: Arrival and exploration
programme.desc: Join Dominik Gührs as he arrives in his favourite city, Bangkok, on the hunt for perfect wakeboarding spots. Wakeboarder Dominik Gührs is on a tour of his favourite city: Thailand's capital, Bangkok. He's on the hunt for the best spots to wakeboard in. Travel with Dominik as he flies in from Munich, Germany.

programme.title: Iron to the Core
programme.desc: Long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. Decorated long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. From preparation to race day, it's a life spent enduring gruelling trials, but every small success makes the arduous journey worth it.

programme.title: Blast Off
programme.desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an adventure across Australia with modest microlight equipment. Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an ambitious adventure across Australia with a pair of modest microlight aircrafts. Accompanied by their fiancées, Lexi and Elsie, and a local guide, Bart, they fly to their first stop: Wardang Island.

programme.title: First and only practice
programme.desc: With Wales Rally GB fast approaching, Mike Chen gets his last practices in before the race. Will it be enough? With Wales Rally GB fast approaching, Mike Chen takes a McLaren 570S around the track as he explains the differences between rally and circuit racing. Then it's back to Cumbria, UK for his one and only practice with his co-driver before the big race.

programme.title: Crunch time at Wales Rally GB
programme.desc: After the training, prep and practice, Mike Chen and co-driver Richard Millener race in Wales Rally GB. Mike Chen has gone from zero rally experience to racing in one of the most challenging WRC races in the word, Wales Rally GB. Can Mike and co-driver Richard Millener survive the three intense days of racing and make it over the finish line?

programme.title: Packing the Bags
programme.desc: David Colturi decides to compete in the Cliff Diving World Series, balancing travel and competition with some. David Colturi decides to compete in the Cliff Diving World Series, balancing travel and competition with a little personal time. Next on his schedule are the tropical Azores islands in Portugal and the La Rochelle in France.

programme.title: Down Time
programme.desc: Cliff diver David Colturi recalibrates with some rest and relaxation at the halfway point of the season. With four weeks before his next competition, David Colturi unplugs from the world of cliff diving and spends time with his closest friends. Fighting through a shoulder injury has been a struggle, but a little time off brings him back to centre.

programme.title: Fighting the Good Fight
programme.desc: While in Bosnia and Herzegovina cliff diver David Colturi comes to terms with a tough decision. Pro cliff diver David Colturi comes to terms with the toughest decision he’s had to make all year: it’s time to end his season. His injuries have taken their toll, but they can't stop him from putting together one last impressive performance.

programme.title: A Kid from Somewhere
programme.sub-title: An intimate portrait of three young artists
programme.desc: Follow LA Timpa, Pat O'Rourke and Olivia Bee as they seek to overcome the challenges faced by young artists. Follow three young artists – LA Timpa, Pat O'Rourke and Olivia Bee – who are linked by a common drive: to find their voice and ultimately their career through their art in an ever-changing digital landscape.

programme.title: The Volcano
programme.desc: Aaron Chase takes a ride down and active volcano with fellow pro Chris Van Dine and some lucky friends. When Aaron Chase gets a call from Chris Van Dine saying they have a chance to get helicoptered to the top of an active volcano then ride down it, there's no way he's passing that up. Ride along with the crew as they race on the volcanic face.

programme.title: The Road Gap
programme.desc: For Aaron Chase, the best part of waking up is hitting a road gap over a Red Bull trophy truck on live TV. For Aaron Chase, the best part of waking up is hitting a road gap over a speeding Red Bull trophy truck on live TV. Check out the view of the stunt from the helmet GoPros of Aaron and Specialized pro rider Katie Holden.
